comment: I strongly condemn this terrorist attack as a Turkish Muslim.I love my Prophet.But my Prophet rejects terrorism.
amr:
# ::snt I strongly condemn this terrorist attack as a Turkish Muslim.I love my Prophet.But my Prophet rejects terrorism.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / condemn-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (a / attack-01
                  :mod (t / terrorist))
            :ARG1-of (s / strong-02)
            :manner (r / religious-group
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Muslim")
                  :mod (c2 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Turkey"))))
      :snt2 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (l / love-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Prophet")
                        :poss ii2))
            :ARG2 (r2 / reject-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (t2 / terrorism))))
